sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(A.EAISVCNAME) as "CNT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIMS02 B ON A.EAISVCNAME = B.EAISVCNAME WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD IN (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE USERID = #loginId#)
UPPER(B.REFMSGIDNAME) LIKE '%'||#cnvsnName#||'%'
UPPER(A.EAISVCNAME) LIKE '%'||#searchEAISvcName#||'%'
UPPER(A.EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE '%'||#searchBizCode#||'%'
ORDER BY A.EAISVCNAME, B.SVCPRCSSNO, B.REFMSGIDNO

SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO" , EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD", EAISVCNAME AS "EAISVCNAME", EAISVCDESC AS "EAISVCDESC", SVCPRCSSNO AS "SVCPRCSSNOSTR", REFMSGIDNO AS "REFMSGIDNOSTR", REFMSGIDNAME AS "REFMSGIDNAME" FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.EAISVCNAME, B.SVCPRCSSNO, B.REFMSGIDNO) ROWNO, A.EAIBZWKDSTCD EAIBZWKDSTCD, A.EAISVCNAME EAISVCNAME, A.EAISVCDESC EAISVCDESC, B.SVCPRCSSNO SVCPRCSSNOSTR, B.REFMSGIDNO REFMSGIDNOSTR, B.REFMSGIDNAME REFMSGIDNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIMS02 B ON A.EAISVCNAME = B.EAISVCNAME WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD IN (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE USERID = #loginId#)
UPPER(B.REFMSGIDNAME) LIKE '%'||#cnvsnName#||'%'
UPPER(A.EAISVCNAME) LIKE '%'||#searchEAISvcName#||'%'
UPPER(A.EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE '%'||#searchBizCode#||'%'
) T WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT LOUTNAME AS "CNVSNNAME", LOUTNAME AS "CNVSNDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR07 WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD IN (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE USERID = #loginId#) AND LOUTNAME LIKE '%' || #cnvsnName#

DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIMS02 WHERE EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName#
SVCPRCSSNO = CAST(#svcPrcssNo# AS NUMERIC)
REFMSGIDNO = CAST(#refMsgIdNo# AS NUMERIC)
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIMS02 SET SVCPRCSSNO = CAST(#svcPrcssNo# AS NUMERIC) , REFMSGIDNO = CAST(#refMsgIDNo# AS NUMERIC) , REFMSGIDNAME = #refMsgIDName# WHERE EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName#
